title: Too much hype
review: I eagerly awaited the arrival of 'Blair Witch' to the theater and excitedly went last week.  I was so upset with the movie.  I think that there might have been too much hype surrounding the movie, because I guess I expected it to be spectacular but instead found it boring.  Nothing was really scary and the end, which everyone told me was spell-binding, left me wondering, 'Thats it?  Its over?'  The movie focuses more on the conflict between the film makers than the witch.  What a let down!
